titles.title: Bear Poaching Elimination Act of 2022
Bear Poaching Elimination Act of 2022

A bill to conserve global bear populations by prohibiting the importation, exportation, and interstate trade of bear viscera and items, products, or substances containing, or labeled or advertised as containing, bear viscera, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
Bear Poaching Elimination Act of 2022
This bill makes it unlawful for a person to knowingly import, export, sell, purchase, possess, transport, deliver, or receive bear viscera or related products except for limited acts carried out solely to enforce wildlife protection laws.
